pageContext.claim: “To think I signed the Whistleblower Protection Act!”
pageContext.analysis: Trump made this comment over a White House tweet about the administration's efforts for veterans. Trump did not sign the Whistleblower Protection Act, which was passed in 1989 and protects all federal whistleblowers. He signed the Veterans Affairs Accountability and Whistleblower Protection Act of 2017, which is limited to the VA.
